components: STEERING,SERVICE BRAKES, AIR,AIR BAGS,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: WHILE PULLING INTO PARKING SPACE (RIGHT) IN PARKING GARAGE MY EXPLORER  EXPERIENCED A SUDDEN ACCLERATION-AT FULL THROTTLE (SNAPPING THE STEERING  WHEEL TO THE RIGHT) (EXTREMELY LOUD REVVING, WHINING AND ANOTHER SOUND LIKE  A BAD BELT SCREECH ALL AT THE SAME TIME) BEFORE THE CRASH. NO BRAKES (PEDAL  WENT TO THE FLOOR). CRASHED INTO STEEL I-BEAM BENDING IT AND CRACKING  CONCRETE PILLARS. NO AIRBAG ON IMPACT.
